Title: Relates to contracts between state agencies and not-for-profit organizations; repeals a provision of the state finance law relating thereto
Summary: Relates to provisions governing contracting between state agencies and not-for-profit organizations including new, renewal, and extension contracts and advance payments and interest for such contracts; repeals provisions relating to interest payments.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to contracting between state agencies and not-for-profit organizations; and to repeal subdivision 7 of section 179-v of such law relating thereto
